channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Regular occurrence of flying, 16th August
item.description:
Yet again someone has dumped furniture, mattress's, box’s with addresses on what looks like clinical waste. What are Southwark Council doing about this ongoing problem? Please assist in this matter ASAP .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Phelp Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge freezer left by the bins, 16th August
item.description:

item.title: High levels of gas canisters and rubbish including foam filling, 16th August
item.description:
High levels of gas canisters and rubbish including foam filling across the pavement and along the road which needs cleaning safely. Also, the bus stop up the road called Queen Mary's Hospital / Frognal Avenue has an entire kerb of decaying rubbish that needs to be removed. Gas canisters are mainly located at What3Words location 'fried.brain.rising', although more are located across the road in the hedgerow. Many thanks in advance!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watery Lane, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish in middle flowerbed of Liverpool grove, 16th August
item.description:
Please kindly clear up the rubbish in the flower beds on Liverpool Grove pedestrianised area, particularly the middle flower bed in the street. It would be great if these could be litter picked daily when the street is cleaned - not sure why the street cleaners don’t do the flower beds also? Many thanks !

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Liverpool Grove, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
